sqlMap.select:
select g.wehago_token, c.comp_seq, ifnull(c.comp_cd,'') as comp_cd, $DB_NEOS$FN_GetMultiLang(#langCode#, cm.comp_name_multi) as comp_name, ifnull(c.comp_regist_num,'') as comp_regist_num, ifnull(cm.owner_name,'') as owner_name, ifnull(c.wehago_key,'') as wehago_key, c.wehago_sync_date, ifnull(c.wehago_sync_yn,'N') as wehago_sync_yn from $DB_NEOS$t_co_group g join $DB_NEOS$t_co_comp c on g.group_seq = c.group_seq join $DB_NEOS$v_t_co_comp_multi cm on c.comp_seq = cm.comp_seq where c.use_yn = 'Y'
and ifnull(c.wehago_key,'') != ''
and ifnull(c.wehago_key,'') = ''
and $DB_NEOS$FN_GetMultiLang(#langCode#, cm.comp_name_multi) like concat('%',#compName#,'%')
and ifnull(c.comp_cd,'') like concat('%',#compCd#,'%')
and ifnull(c.comp_cd,'') like concat('%',#compCd#,'%')
and ifnull(c.comp_regist_num,'') like concat('%',#compRegistNum#,'%')
and ifnull(cm.owner_name,'') like concat('%',#ownerName#,'%')
select ifnull(g.wehago_server, '') as wehago_server ,ifnull(g.wehago_token, '') as wehago_token ,ifnull(g.wehago_software_key, '') as wehago_software_key from $DB_NEOS$t_co_group g
sqlMap.update: UPDATE $DB_NEOS$t_co_comp SET wehago_key = #company_no# , wehago_domain_service_key = #domain_service_key# , wehago_id = #portal_id# WHERE comp_seq = #etc1#
update $DB_NEOS$t_co_comp set wehago_sync_yn = 'Y' ,wehago_sync_date = NOW() where comp_seq = #compSeq#

update $DB_NEOS$t_co_comp set wehago_sync_date = NOW()
,wehago_position_group = #wehagoPositionGroup#
,wehago_duty_group = #wehagoDutyGroup#
where comp_seq = #compSeq#
sqlMap.delete: delete from $DB_NEOS$t_wehago_duty_position_sync where dp_seq = #dpSeq# and comp_seq = #compSeq# and dp_type = #dpType#
sqlMap.insert: insert into $DB_NEOS$t_wehago_duty_position_sync(dp_seq, comp_seq, dp_type, wehago_key, create_date) VALUES (#dpSeq#, #compSeq#, #dpType#, #wehagoKey#, NOW());
sqlMap.select: select dp.dp_seq as seq, dpm.dp_name as position_rank_name, ifnull(dp.order_num,999999999) as position_rank_order from $DB_NEOS$t_co_comp_duty_position dp join $DB_NEOS$t_co_comp_duty_position_multi dpm on dpm.lang_code = 'kr' and dp.dp_type = dpm.dp_type and dp.dp_seq = dpm.dp_seq and dp.comp_seq = dpm.comp_seq where dp.dp_type = #dpType# and (dp.comp_seq = #compSeq# or dp.comp_seq = '0')

select c.group_seq, c.comp_seq, dp.dp_type, dp.dp_seq as seq, case when dp.dp_type = 'POSITION' then c.wehago_position_group else c.wehago_duty_group end as position_rank_group_no, ifnull(wehago.wehago_key,'') as position_rank_no, dpm.dp_name as position_rank_name, ifnull(dp.order_num,999999999) as position_rank_order from $DB_NEOS$t_co_comp_duty_position dp join $DB_NEOS$t_co_comp_duty_position_multi dpm on dpm.lang_code = 'kr' and dp.comp_seq = dpm.comp_seq and dp.dp_seq = dpm.dp_seq and dp.dp_type = dpm.dp_type join $DB_NEOS$t_co_comp c on ((dp.dp_type = 'POSITION' and ifnull(c.wehago_position_group,'') != '') or (dp.dp_type = 'DUTY' and ifnull(c.wehago_duty_group,'') != '')) and ifnull(c.wehago_key,'') != '' and c.wehago_sync_yn = 'Y' and (dp.comp_seq = '0' or dp.comp_seq = c.comp_seq) left join $DB_NEOS$t_wehago_duty_position_sync wehago on wehago.comp_seq = c.comp_seq and wehago.dp_seq = dp.dp_seq and wehago.dp_type = dp.dp_type where dp.dp_type = #dpType# and dp.dp_seq = #dpSeq#

select g.wehago_server ,g.wehago_token ,g.wehago_key ,c.wehago_key as wehago_cno ,c.wehago_id from $DB_NEOS$t_co_group g join $DB_NEOS$t_co_comp c on g.group_seq = c.group_seq where c.comp_seq = #compSeq# and ifnull(c.wehago_key,'') != ''
sqlMap.update: update $DB_NEOS$t_co_dept set wehago_key = #organization_no# ,wehago_sync_date = NOW() where dept_seq = #seq#
update $DB_NEOS$t_co_emp set wehago_key = #wehagoKey# ,wehago_sync_date = NOW() where emp_seq = #seq#
sqlMap.select: select c.wehago_key as company_no ,d.dept_seq as seq ,$DB_NEOS$get_dept_level(d.dept_seq, d.group_seq) as organization_level ,d.parent_dept_seq as seq_parent_no ,ifnull(d.order_num,999999999) as organization_order ,dm.dept_name as organization_name from $DB_NEOS$t_co_comp c join $DB_NEOS$t_co_dept d on d.comp_seq = c.comp_seq and ifnull(d.ea_yn,'N') = 'N' join $DB_NEOS$t_co_dept_multi dm on d.dept_seq = dm.dept_seq and dm.lang_code = 'kr' where d.comp_seq = #compSeq# and ifnull(d.wehago_key,'') = '' order by d.dept_level, d.order_num

select c.wehago_key as company_no ,d.dept_seq as seq ,$DB_NEOS$get_dept_level(d.dept_seq, d.group_seq) as organization_level ,d.parent_dept_seq as seq_parent_no ,ifnull(d.order_num,999999999) as organization_order ,dm.dept_name as organization_name ,ifnull(d.wehago_key,'') as organization_no ,ifnull(pd.wehago_key,'0') as organization_parent_no from $DB_NEOS$t_co_comp c join $DB_NEOS$t_co_dept d on d.comp_seq = c.comp_seq and ifnull(d.ea_yn,'N') = 'N' join $DB_NEOS$t_co_dept_multi dm on d.dept_seq = dm.dept_seq and dm.lang_code = 'kr' left join $DB_NEOS$t_co_dept pd on d.parent_dept_seq = pd.dept_seq where c.wehago_sync_yn = 'Y' and ifnull(c.wehago_key,'') != '' and d.dept_seq = #deptSeq#

select e.emp_seq as seq, em.emp_name as user_name, replace(replace(ifnull(e.mobile_tel_num,''),'-',''),' ','') as user_contact, case when ifnull(e.email_addr,'') != '' and ifnull(c.email_domain,'') != '' then concat(e.email_addr, '@', c.email_domain) when ifnull(e.out_mail,'') != '' and ifnull(e.out_domain,'') != '' then concat(e.out_mail, '@', e.out_domain) else '' end as user_email, ifnull(e.wehago_key,'') as wehago_key, ifnull(d.wehago_key,'') as organization_no, date_format(ifnull(e.join_day,now()),'%Y-%m-%d') as join_date, ifnull(posi.wehago_key,'') as rank_no, ifnull(duty.wehago_key,'') as position_no from $DB_NEOS$t_co_emp e join $DB_NEOS$t_co_emp_multi em on em.lang_code = 'kr' and e.emp_seq = em.emp_seq join $DB_NEOS$t_co_emp_comp ec on e.emp_seq = ec.emp_seq and ec.work_status != '001' join $DB_NEOS$t_co_emp_dept ed on ed.emp_seq = ec.emp_seq and ed.dept_seq = ec.dept_seq join $DB_NEOS$t_co_comp c on ec.comp_seq = c.comp_seq left join $DB_NEOS$t_co_dept d on d.dept_seq = ec.dept_seq left join $DB_NEOS$t_wehago_duty_position_sync posi on posi.dp_type = 'POSITION' and posi.comp_seq = ed.comp_seq and posi.dp_seq = ed.position_code left join $DB_NEOS$t_wehago_duty_position_sync duty on duty.dp_type = 'DUTY' and duty.comp_seq = ed.comp_seq and duty.dp_seq = ed.duty_code where ec.comp_seq = #compSeq# and ifnull(e.wehago_key,'') = ''

select * from ( select substring_index(e.wehago_key,'▦',1) as employee_no, replace(replace(ifnull(e.mobile_tel_num,''),'-',''),' ','') as user_contact, case when ifnull(e.email_addr,'') != '' and ifnull(c.email_domain,'') != '' then concat(e.email_addr, '@', c.email_domain) when ifnull(e.out_mail,'') != '' and ifnull(e.out_domain,'') != '' then concat(e.out_mail, '@', e.out_domain) else '' end as user_email, em.emp_name as user_name from $DB_NEOS$t_co_emp e join $DB_NEOS$t_co_emp_multi em on em.lang_code = 'kr' and e.emp_seq = em.emp_seq join $DB_NEOS$t_co_emp_comp ec on ifnull(e.wehago_id,'') = '' and e.emp_seq = ec.emp_seq and ec.work_status != '001' and e.wehago_key like concat('%▦', ec.comp_seq) join $DB_NEOS$t_co_comp c on ec.comp_seq = c.comp_seq where ec.comp_seq = #compSeq# ) result where user_email != ''

select.isEqual: select e.emp_seq as seq, em.emp_name as user_name, replace(replace(ifnull(e.mobile_tel_num,''),'-',''),' ','') as user_contact, case when ifnull(e.email_addr,'') != '' and ifnull(c.email_domain,'') != '' then concat(e.email_addr, '@', c.email_domain) when ifnull(e.out_mail,'') != '' and ifnull(e.out_domain,'') != '' then concat(e.out_mail, '@', e.out_domain) else '' end as user_email, ifnull(e.wehago_key,'') as wehago_key, ifnull(d.wehago_key,'') as organization_no, date_format(ifnull(e.join_day,now()),'%Y-%m-%d') as join_date, ifnull(posi.wehago_key,'') as rank_no, ifnull(duty.wehago_key,'') as position_no from $DB_NEOS$t_co_emp e join $DB_NEOS$t_co_emp_multi em on em.lang_code = 'kr' and e.emp_seq = em.emp_seq join $DB_NEOS$t_co_emp_comp ec on e.emp_seq = ec.emp_seq join $DB_NEOS$t_co_emp_dept ed on ed.emp_seq = ec.emp_seq and ed.dept_seq = ec.dept_seq join $DB_NEOS$t_co_comp c on ec.comp_seq = c.comp_seq left join $DB_NEOS$t_co_dept d on d.dept_seq = ec.dept_seq left join $DB_NEOS$t_wehago_duty_position_sync posi on posi.dp_type = 'POSITION' and posi.comp_seq = ed.comp_seq and posi.dp_seq = ed.position_code left join $DB_NEOS$t_wehago_duty_position_sync duty on duty.dp_type = 'DUTY' and duty.comp_seq = ed.comp_seq and duty.dp_seq = ed.duty_code where c.wehago_sync_yn = 'Y' and ifnull(c.wehago_key,'') != '' and ifnull(e.wehago_key,'') = '' and ec.comp_seq = #compSeq# and e.emp_seq = #empSeq#

select e.emp_seq as seq, em.emp_name as user_name, replace(replace(ifnull(e.mobile_tel_num,''),'-',''),' ','') as user_contact, case when ifnull(e.email_addr,'') != '' and ifnull(c.email_domain,'') != '' then concat(e.email_addr, '@', c.email_domain) when ifnull(e.out_mail,'') != '' and ifnull(e.out_domain,'') != '' then concat(e.out_mail, '@', e.out_domain) else '' end as user_email, ifnull(e.wehago_key,'') as wehago_key, ifnull(d.wehago_key,'') as organization_no, date_format(ifnull(e.join_day,now()),'%Y-%m-%d') as join_date, ifnull(posi.wehago_key,'') as rank_no, ifnull(duty.wehago_key,'') as position_no from $DB_NEOS$t_co_emp e join $DB_NEOS$t_co_emp_multi em on em.lang_code = 'kr' and e.emp_seq = em.emp_seq join $DB_NEOS$t_co_emp_comp ec on e.emp_seq = ec.emp_seq join $DB_NEOS$t_co_emp_dept ed on ed.emp_seq = ec.emp_seq and ed.dept_seq = ec.dept_seq join $DB_NEOS$t_co_comp c on ec.comp_seq = c.comp_seq left join $DB_NEOS$t_co_dept d on d.dept_seq = ec.dept_seq left join $DB_NEOS$t_wehago_duty_position_sync posi on posi.dp_type = 'POSITION' and posi.comp_seq = ed.comp_seq and posi.dp_seq = ed.position_code left join $DB_NEOS$t_wehago_duty_position_sync duty on duty.dp_type = 'DUTY' and duty.comp_seq = ed.comp_seq and duty.dp_seq = ed.duty_code where c.wehago_sync_yn = 'Y' and ifnull(c.wehago_key,'') != '' and ifnull(e.wehago_key,'') != '' and ec.comp_seq = #compSeq# and e.emp_seq = #empSeq#

isNotEqual.isNotEqual:
select e.emp_seq as seq, em.emp_name as user_name, replace(replace(ifnull(e.mobile_tel_num,''),'-',''),' ','') as user_contact, case when ifnull(e.email_addr,'') != '' and ifnull(c.email_domain,'') != '' then concat(e.email_addr, '@', c.email_domain) when ifnull(e.out_mail,'') != '' and ifnull(e.out_domain,'') != '' then concat(e.out_mail, '@', e.out_domain) else '' end as user_email, ifnull(e.wehago_key,'') as wehago_key, '' as organization_no from $DB_NEOS$t_co_emp e join $DB_NEOS$t_co_emp_multi em on em.lang_code = 'kr' and e.emp_seq = em.emp_seq join $DB_NEOS$t_co_comp c on e.wehago_key like concat('%▦', c.comp_seq) where c.wehago_sync_yn = 'Y' and ifnull(c.wehago_key,'') != '' and e.emp_seq = #empSeq#
and c.comp_seq = #compSeq#
limit 1

sqlMap.select: select ifnull(g.wehago_server,'') as wehago_server ,ifnull(g.wehago_aes_key,'') as wehago_aes_key ,ifnull(c.wehago_key,'') as wehago_key ,ifnull(cm.comp_name,'') as company_name_kr ,ifnull(c.comp_regist_num,'') as company_reg_no ,'' as company_sub_reg_no ,'0' as company_business_type ,ifnull(c.comp_num,'') as company_business_no ,ifnull(cm.owner_name,'') as ceo_name_kr ,'' as company_tel1 ,'' as company_tel2 ,'' as company_tel3 ,'' as business_type_code ,ifnull(cm.biz_condition,'') as business_format ,ifnull(cm.item,'') as business_type ,ifnull(c.zip_code,'') as company_zipcode ,ifnull(cm.addr,'') as company_address1 ,ifnull(cm.detail_addr,'') as company_address2 from $DB_NEOS$t_co_group g join $DB_NEOS$t_co_comp c on g.group_seq = c.group_seq join $DB_NEOS$t_co_comp_multi cm on c.comp_seq = cm.comp_seq and cm.lang_code = 'kr' where c.comp_seq = #compSeq#
select emp_seq, ifnull(wehago_key,'') as wehago_key, ifnull(wehago_id,'') as wehago_id, wehago_sync_date from $DB_NEOS$t_co_emp where emp_seq = #empSeq# and wehago_key like concat('%▦',#userNo#,'▦%')
sqlMap.update: update $DB_NEOS$t_co_emp set wehago_id = #wehagoId# ,wehago_sync_date = NOW() where emp_seq = #empSeq#
sqlMap.insert: insert into $DB_NEOS$t_co_wehago(group_seq, comp_seq, use_yn, wehago_server_ip, access_token, sync_type, create_seq, create_date, modify_seq, modify_date, org_sync_status, org_sync_date, sch_type, sch_info, sch_time) VALUES (#groupSeq#, #compSeq#, #useYn#, #wehagoServerIp#, #accessToken#, #syncType#, #createSeq#, NOW(), #createSeq#, NOW(), 'I', null, '', '', '');

insert ignore into $DB_NEOS$t_co_wehago_dept(sync_seq, uid, reg_date, sync_status, error_msg, sync_date, sync_type, comp_seq, dept_seq, parent_dept_seq, dept_name) select '', concat('GW_DEPT_', a.dept_seq), DATE_ADD(now(), INTERVAL a.dept_level-100 SECOND), '', '', null, 'I', a.comp_seq, a.dept_seq, a.parent_dept_seq, b.dept_name from $DB_NEOS$t_co_dept a join $DB_NEOS$t_co_dept_multi b on a.dept_seq = b.dept_seq and b.lang_code='kr' where a.comp_seq = #compSeq# and a.use_yn = 'Y';

insert into $DB_NEOS$t_co_wehago_emp(sync_seq, uid, reg_date, sync_status, error_msg, sync_date, sync_type, comp_seq, dept_seq, emp_seq, login_id, email_addr, email_domain, emp_name, duty_code, mobile_tel_num, fax_num, home_tel_num, tel_num, login_passwd, use_yn) select '', concat('GW_EMP_', e.emp_seq), now(), '', '', null, 'I', ec.comp_seq, ed.dept_seq, e.emp_seq, e.login_id, ifnull(e.email_addr,e.login_id), ifnull(c.email_domain,''), ifnull(em.emp_name,e.login_id), ifnull(ed.duty_code,''), ifnull(e.mobile_tel_num,''), ifnull(ed.fax_num,''), ifnull(e.home_tel_num,''), ifnull(ed.tel_num,''), '' as login_passwd, case when ec.use_yn = 'N' or ec.work_status = '001' then 'N' else 'Y' end as use_yn from $DB_NEOS$t_co_emp e join $DB_NEOS$t_co_emp_multi em on e.emp_seq=em.emp_seq and em.lang_code='kr' join $DB_NEOS$t_co_emp_dept ed on e.emp_seq=ed.emp_seq and ed.comp_seq=e.main_comp_seq and ed.main_dept_yn='Y' join $DB_NEOS$t_co_emp_comp ec on ed.emp_seq=ec.emp_seq and ed.comp_seq=ec.comp_seq and ec.work_status != '001' join $DB_NEOS$t_co_comp c on ec.comp_seq=c.comp_seq where ec.comp_seq=#compSeq#
sqlMap.update: update $DB_NEOS$t_co_wehago set modify_date = now() ,modify_seq = #createSeq# ,wehago_server_ip = #wehagoServerIp# ,access_token = #accessToken# ,use_yn = #useYn# ,sync_type = #syncType# where comp_seq=#compSeq#
sqlMap.select:
select result.sync_seq, DATE_FORMAT(result.sync_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as sync_date, case when result.sync_mode = 'M' then '수동' else '자동' end as sync_mode, result.emp_name, (select count(*) from $DB_NEOS$t_co_ldap_dept where sync_seq=result.sync_seq and sync_type='I') as dept_new, (select count(*) from $DB_NEOS$t_co_ldap_dept where sync_seq=result.sync_seq and sync_type='U') as dept_mod, (select count(*) from $DB_NEOS$t_co_ldap_dept where sync_seq=result.sync_seq and sync_type='D') as dept_del, (select count(*) from $DB_NEOS$t_co_ldap_emp where sync_seq=result.sync_seq and sync_type='I') as emp_new, (select count(*) from $DB_NEOS$t_co_ldap_emp where sync_seq=result.sync_seq and sync_type='U') as emp_mod, (select count(*) from $DB_NEOS$t_co_ldap_emp where sync_seq=result.sync_seq and sync_type='D') as emp_del from (select r.sync_seq as sync_seq, r.sync_date as sync_date, r.sync_mode as sync_mode, em.emp_name as emp_name from $DB_NEOS$t_co_ldap_req r left join $DB_NEOS$t_co_emp_multi em on r.create_seq=em.emp_seq and em.lang_code='kr' where r.comp_seq=#compSeq#
and r.sync_mode = #syncType#
order by r.sync_date desc
LIMIT $startNum$, $endNum$
) result

select count(*) as cnt from $DB_NEOS$t_co_ldap_req where comp_seq=#compSeq#
and r.sync_mode = #syncType#
sqlMap.insert: insert into $DB_NEOS$t_co_ldap_api_log(reg_date, api_name, input_param, error_msg) values (NOW(), #apiName#, #inputParam#, #errorMsg#);
sqlMap.select: select * from $DB_NEOS$t_co_ldap where sync_mode='gta' and sch_time=#schTime# and ( (sch_type = '1') or (sch_type = '2' and sch_info = DAYOFWEEK(NOW())) or (sch_type = '3' and sch_info = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%d')) or (sch_type = '4' and sch_info = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d')) )
select a.email_domain, b.comp_name from $DB_NEOS$t_co_comp a join $DB_NEOS$t_co_comp_multi b on a.comp_seq=b.comp_seq and b.lang_code='kr' where a.comp_seq=#compSeq#
select e.login_id, em.emp_name from $DB_NEOS$t_co_emp e join $DB_NEOS$t_co_emp_multi em on e.emp_seq = em.emp_seq and em.lang_code='kr' where e.emp_seq = #empSeq#
sqlMap.insert: insert into $DB_NEOS$t_co_ldap_dept(sync_seq, uid, reg_date, sync_status, error_msg, sync_date, sync_type, comp_seq, dept_seq, parent_dept_seq, dept_name) VALUES ('', UUID(), NOW(), '', '', null, #syncType#, #compSeq#, #deptSeq#, #parentDeptSeq#, #deptName#);

insert into $DB_NEOS$t_co_ldap_emp (sync_seq, uid, reg_date, sync_status, error_msg, sync_date, sync_type, comp_seq, dept_seq, emp_seq, login_id, email_addr, email_domain, emp_name, duty_code, mobile_tel_num, fax_num, home_tel_num, tel_num, login_passwd, use_yn) VALUES ( #syncSeq#,'', UUID(), NOW(), '', '', null, #syncType#,'', #compSeq#,'', #deptSeq#,'', #empSeq#,'', #loginId#,'', #emailAddr#,'', #emailDomain#,'', #empName#,'', #dutyCode#,'', #mobileTelNum#,'', #faxNum#,'', #homeTelNum#,'', #telNum#,'', #loginPasswd#,'', #useYn#'Y' );

insert into $DB_NEOS$t_co_ldap_emp (sync_seq, uid, reg_date, sync_status, error_msg, sync_date, sync_type, comp_seq, dept_seq, emp_seq, login_id, email_addr, email_domain, emp_name, duty_code, mobile_tel_num, fax_num, home_tel_num, tel_num, login_passwd, use_yn) VALUES
(#userInfoList[].syncSeq#, UUID(), NOW(), '', '', null, #userInfoList[].syncType#, #userInfoList[].compSeq#, #userInfoList[].deptSeq#, #userInfoList[].empSeq#, #userInfoList[].loginId#, #userInfoList[].emailAddr#, #userInfoList[].emailDomain#, #userInfoList[].empName#, #userInfoList[].dutyCode#, #userInfoList[].mobileTelNum#, #userInfoList[].faxNum#, #userInfoList[].homeTelNum#, #userInfoList[].telNum#, #userInfoList[].loginPasswd#, #userInfoList[].useYn# )
sqlMap.update:
update $DB_NEOS$t_co_ldap_emp set
sync_status='N' ,sync_date=now() ,emp_seq=#empSeq#
sync_status='F' ,error_msg=#errorMsg#
where sync_seq=#syncSeq#;
sqlMap.select: select * from $DB_NEOS$t_co_ldap_dept where dept_seq=#deptSeq# order by reg_date desc limit 1;
select * from $DB_NEOS$t_co_ldap_emp where emp_seq=#empSeq# order by reg_date desc limit 1;
select * from $DB_NEOS$t_co_ldap_dept a join $DB_NEOS$t_co_ldap b on a.comp_seq = b.comp_seq where a.uid=#uid#;
select * from $DB_NEOS$t_co_ldap_emp a join $DB_NEOS$t_co_ldap b on a.comp_seq = b.comp_seq where a.uid=#uid#;
sqlMap.delete: delete from $DB_NEOS$t_co_ldap_key where org_div=#orgDiv# and gw_seq=#gwSeq#;
sqlMap.update:
update $DB_NEOS$t_co_ldap_key set org_div = org_div
,ad_name = #adName#
,relate_dept_seq=#relateDeptSeq#
,pw_sync_yn=#pwSyncYn#
where org_div=#orgDiv# and gw_seq=#gwSeq#
sqlMap.select: select * from $DB_NEOS$t_co_ldap_key where org_div=#orgDiv# and gw_seq=#gwSeq#;
sqlMap.update: update $DB_NEOS$t_co_ldap set modify_date = now() ,modify_seq = #createSeq# ,sch_type = #schType# ,sch_info = #schInfo# ,sch_time = #schTime# where comp_seq=#compSeq#
sqlMap.select:
select * from (select DATE_FORMAT(d.reg_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as reg_date, d.reg_date as reg_datetime, case d.sync_type when 'I' then '등록' when 'U' then '수정' when 'D' then '삭제' else '' end as sync_type, case d.sync_status when 'P' then '처리중' when 'C' then '처리완료' when 'E' then '전송불가' else '대기' end as sync_status, d.error_msg as sync_msg, ifnull(DATE_FORMAT(d.sync_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'),'') as sync_date, '부서' as org_div, dm.dept_name as org_name from $DB_NEOS$t_co_ldap_dept d join $DB_NEOS$t_co_dept_multi dm on dm.lang_code='kr' and d.dept_seq = dm.dept_seq and d.sync_seq=#syncSeq# union all select DATE_FORMAT(d.reg_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as reg_date, d.reg_date as reg_datetime, case d.sync_type when 'I' then '등록' when 'U' then '수정' when 'D' then '삭제' else '' end as sync_type, case d.sync_status when 'P' then '처리중' when 'C' then '처리완료' when 'E' then '전송불가' else '대기' end as sync_status, d.error_msg as sync_msg, ifnull(DATE_FORMAT(d.sync_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'),'') as sync_date, '사용자' as org_div, em.emp_name as org_name from $DB_NEOS$t_co_ldap_emp d join $DB_NEOS$t_co_emp_multi em on em.lang_code='kr' and d.emp_seq = em.emp_seq and d.sync_seq=#syncSeq#) result order by reg_datetime desc
LIMIT $startNum$, $endNum$
select (select count(*) from $DB_NEOS$t_co_ldap_dept where sync_seq=#syncSeq#) + (select count(*) from $DB_NEOS$t_co_ldap_emp where sync_seq=#syncSeq#) as cnt
sqlMap.insert: insert into $DB_NEOS$t_co_ldap_req (sync_seq, comp_seq, sync_date, sync_mode, create_seq) VALUES (#syncSeq#, #compSeq#, NOW(), #syncMode#, #createSeq#);
sqlMap.select: select count(*) as cnt from $DB_NEOS$t_co_ldap_dept where comp_seq=#compSeq# and sync_status=''
select count(*) as cnt from $DB_NEOS$t_co_ldap_emp where comp_seq=#compSeq# and sync_status=''

select result.org_div, result.org_name, result.uid from ( select d.reg_date, 'D' as org_div, dm.dept_name as org_name, d.uid from $DB_NEOS$t_co_ldap_dept d join $DB_NEOS$t_co_dept_multi dm on d.dept_seq=dm.dept_seq and dm.lang_code='kr' where d.comp_seq=#compSeq# and d.sync_status='' union all select d.reg_date, 'U' as org_div, dm.emp_name as org_name, d.uid from $DB_NEOS$t_co_ldap_emp d join $DB_NEOS$t_co_emp_multi dm on d.emp_seq=dm.emp_seq and dm.lang_code='kr' where d.comp_seq=#compSeq# and d.sync_status='' ) result order by reg_date

select case when e.login_passwd = #loginPasswdEnc# then 'Y' else 'N' end as enc_password_check, ifnull(lk.pw_sync_yn,'N') as pw_sync_yn, lk.ad_name, lk.gw_seq, l.comp_seq, l.ad_ip, l.userid, l.password, l.ad_domain, l.base_dir, l.dept_dir, l.emp_dir, l.dept_ou_type, ifnull(l.sync_mode,'') as sync_mode, case when l.sync_mode = 'atg' and le.emp_seq is not null then 'Y' when l.sync_mode = 'gta' and lk.gw_seq is not null then 'Y' when l.sync_mode = 'login' then 'Y' else 'N' end as ldap_use_yn from $DB_NEOS$t_co_emp e join $DB_NEOS$t_co_emp_comp ec on e.emp_seq = ec.emp_seq and ec.use_yn = 'Y' join $DB_NEOS$t_co_comp c on ec.comp_seq = c.comp_seq and c.use_yn = 'Y' left join $DB_NEOS$t_co_ldap l on ec.comp_seq = l.comp_seq left join $DB_NEOS$t_co_ldap_emp le on e.emp_seq = le.emp_seq and l.comp_seq = le.comp_seq left join $DB_NEOS$t_co_ldap_key lk on lk.org_div='U' and e.emp_seq = lk.gw_seq where e.login_id=#loginId# order by l.use_yn desc limit 1;

select.isEqual: select l.group_seq, l.comp_seq, l.use_yn, l.ad_ip, l.userid, l.password, l.ad_domain, l.base_dir, l.dept_dir, l.emp_dir, l.dept_ou_type, l.sync_mode, lk.gw_seq, lk.org_div, lk.ad_name, '' as login_id from $DB_NEOS$t_co_ldap_key lk join $DB_NEOS$t_co_ldap l on lk.comp_seq = l.comp_seq and l.sync_mode='gta' join $DB_NEOS$t_co_comp c on c.comp_seq=l.comp_seq and c.use_yn='Y' where lk.org_div='U' and lk.gw_seq=#empSeq# limit 1;

select l.group_seq, l.comp_seq, l.use_yn, l.ad_ip, l.userid, l.password, l.ad_domain, l.base_dir, l.dept_dir, l.emp_dir, l.dept_ou_type, l.sync_mode, le.emp_seq as gw_seq, 'U' as org_div, le.login_passwd as ad_name, le.login_id from $DB_NEOS$t_co_ldap_emp le join $DB_NEOS$t_co_ldap l on le.comp_seq = l.comp_seq and l.sync_mode='atg' join $DB_NEOS$t_co_comp c on c.comp_seq=l.comp_seq and c.use_yn='Y' where le.emp_seq=#empSeq# limit 1;

sqlMap.select: select * from $DB_NEOS$t_co_ldap_key where comp_seq=#compSeq# and usn=#usn# limit 1;
sqlMap.delete: delete from $DB_NEOS$t_co_ldap_key where org_div='D' and comp_seq = #compSeq# and relate_dept_seq not in (select dept_seq from $DB_NEOS$t_co_dept);
delete from $DB_NEOS$t_co_ldap_emp where comp_seq = #compSeq# and login_id not in (select login_id from t_co_emp);
delete from $DB_NEOS$t_co_ldap_key where comp_seq = #compSeq# and #usnArray# not like concat('%,',usn,',%');
sqlMap.select: select concat(',', group_concat(usn), ',') as usn from $DB_NEOS$t_co_ldap_key where org_div=#orgDiv# and comp_seq=#compSeq#;
select ifnull(concat(',', group_concat(sync_seq), ','),'') as uid from $DB_NEOS$t_co_ldap_emp where comp_seq=#compSeq#;
select * from $DB_NEOS$t_co_ldap_key where comp_seq=#compSeq#;

select count(*) as cnt from $DB_NEOS$t_co_ldap_emp le left join $DB_NEOS$t_co_ldap_key lk on le.dept_seq = lk.relate_dept_seq left join $DB_NEOS$t_co_dept_multi rd on rd.lang_code = 'kr' and lk.relate_dept_seq = rd.dept_seq left join $DB_NEOS$t_co_emp e on le.login_id = e.login_id left join $DB_NEOS$t_co_emp_comp ec on e.emp_seq = ec.emp_seq and le.comp_seq = ec.comp_seq left join $DB_NEOS$t_co_emp_comp ect on le.comp_seq != ect.comp_seq and e.emp_seq = ect.emp_seq and e.main_comp_seq = ect.comp_seq left join $DB_NEOS$t_co_emp_comp cc on le.comp_seq = cc.comp_seq and le.emp_seq = cc.emp_seq left join $DB_NEOS$t_co_dept_multi dm on dm.lang_code = 'kr' and cc.dept_seq = dm.dept_seq where le.comp_seq = #compSeq# and (le.login_id like CONCAT('%',ifnull(#empSearchName#,''),'%') or le.emp_name like CONCAT('%',ifnull(#empSearchName#,''),'%'))
and cc.emp_seq is not null
and cc.emp_seq is null and ec.emp_seq is not null
and cc.emp_seq is null and ec.emp_seq is null and e.emp_seq is not null and ect.emp_seq is not null
and e.emp_seq is null

select le.sync_seq, le.uid, case when cc.emp_seq is not null then '동기화완료' when ec.emp_seq is not null then '동기화대기(동일계정연결)' when e.emp_seq is not null and ect.emp_seq is not null then '동기화불가(중복ID)' else '동기화대기(입사처리)' end as sync_status, le.login_id, le.emp_name, le.email_addr, le.email_domain, le.mobile_tel_num, le.tel_num, ifnull(dm.dept_name,ifnull(rd.dept_name,'')) as gw_dept_name, ifnull(DATE_FORMAT(le.sync_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'),'') as sync_date, ifnull(DATE_FORMAT(le.reg_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'),'') as reg_date, ifnull(ec.emp_seq,'') as link_emp_seq, le.error_msg from $DB_NEOS$t_co_ldap_emp le left join $DB_NEOS$t_co_ldap_key lk on le.dept_seq = lk.relate_dept_seq left join $DB_NEOS$t_co_dept_multi rd on rd.lang_code = 'kr' and lk.relate_dept_seq = rd.dept_seq left join $DB_NEOS$t_co_emp e on le.login_id = e.login_id left join $DB_NEOS$t_co_emp_comp ec on e.emp_seq = ec.emp_seq and le.comp_seq = ec.comp_seq left join $DB_NEOS$t_co_emp_comp ect on le.comp_seq != ect.comp_seq and e.emp_seq = ect.emp_seq and e.main_comp_seq = ect.comp_seq left join $DB_NEOS$t_co_emp_comp cc on le.comp_seq = cc.comp_seq and le.emp_seq = cc.emp_seq left join $DB_NEOS$t_co_dept_multi dm on dm.lang_code = 'kr' and cc.dept_seq = dm.dept_seq where le.comp_seq = #compSeq# and (le.login_id like CONCAT('%',ifnull(#empSearchName#,''),'%') or le.emp_name like CONCAT('%',ifnull(#empSearchName#,''),'%'))
and cc.emp_seq is not null
and cc.emp_seq is null and ec.emp_seq is not null
and cc.emp_seq is null and ec.emp_seq is null and e.emp_seq is not null and ect.emp_seq is not null
and e.emp_seq is null
order by le.sync_date desc, le.reg_date desc, le.emp_name
LIMIT $startNum$, $endNum$
sqlMap.update:
update $DB_NEOS$t_co_ldap_emp le left join $DB_NEOS$t_co_ldap_key lk on le.dept_seq = lk.relate_dept_seq left join $DB_NEOS$t_co_emp e on le.login_id = e.login_id join $DB_NEOS$t_co_emp_comp ec on e.emp_seq = ec.emp_seq and le.comp_seq = ec.comp_seq left join $DB_NEOS$t_co_emp_comp cc on le.comp_seq = cc.comp_seq and le.emp_seq = cc.emp_seq set le.emp_seq = ec.emp_seq, le.sync_date = NOW(), le.sync_status = 'L', error_msg = '동일계정 연결완료' where le.comp_seq = #compSeq# and cc.emp_seq is null
and le.sync_seq in ($chkLdapUser$)
sqlMap.select:
select le.sync_seq, le.uid, le.login_id, le.comp_seq, d.biz_seq, d.dept_seq, le.emp_name, case when le.email_domain = c.email_domain then le.email_addr else le.login_id end as email_addr, case when le.email_domain != c.email_domain then le.email_addr else '' end as out_mail, case when le.email_domain != c.email_domain then le.email_domain else '' end as out_domain, le.mobile_tel_num, le.tel_num, le.fax_num, le.home_tel_num from $DB_NEOS$t_co_ldap_emp le join $DB_NEOS$t_co_ldap_key lk on le.dept_seq = lk.relate_dept_seq
join $DB_NEOS$t_co_dept d on lk.relate_dept_seq = d.dept_seq
join $DB_NEOS$t_co_dept d on d.dept_seq = #selectedDeptSeq#
join $DB_NEOS$t_co_comp c on d.comp_seq = c.comp_seq left join $DB_NEOS$t_co_emp e on le.login_id = e.login_id where le.comp_seq = #compSeq# and e.emp_seq is null
and le.sync_seq in ($chkLdapUser$)
order by le.reg_date desc, le.sync_date desc, le.emp_name
select dept_seq from $DB_NEOS$t_co_dept where use_yn = 'Y' and comp_seq = #compSeq# and dept_cd = #deptCd# limit 1;
